name: Raising Spirits
description:
Raising Spirits is a Cooperative Card Game. Work with your teammate to defeat the boss! Work to build a deck from the card pool with your teammate.  You can also take on the boss alone!

This game was built as a capstone project during the Spring 2019 and Fall 2019 semesters. The game features online lobby creation through photon. This game was built as proof of concept. 

Lead:

  • Alex Pinedo

Programming:

  • Zachary Minott
  • David Taitingfong
  • Edward Vuong
  • Dominique Oyco

Art:

  • Chi Ngo
  • Amairani Pinedo

Audio:

  • Amy Hori

Narrative/Design:

  • Chau Ho
